title: 2. IRRI Agronomy Challege: Laser Leveling (4 January 2012)

tasks.task: Leveling the field for rice cultivation
subtasks: Understanding the importance of water and weed control
Recognizing the role of consistent water levels in seedling survival
Realizing the connection between water control and weed management
Preparing for the drum seeding process in two days
Utilizing laser technology for precise leveling
Operating a tractor attachment for field levelling
Verifying the accuracy of the laser-guided levelling process
Ensuring the field is ready for subsequent drum seeding
